default.$description: Compound token for default border style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a border-color token.

weak.$description: Compound token for weak border style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a border-color token.

moderate.$description: Compound token for moderate border style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a border-color token.

strong.$description: Compound token for strong border style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a border-color token.

extra-strong.$description: Compound token for extra strong border style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a border-color token.

default.$description: Compound token for default divider style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a divider-color token.

subtle.$description: Compound token for subtle divider style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a divider-color token.

subtle-weak.$description: Compound token for a very subtle divider style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a divider-color token.

weak.$description: Compound token for weak divider style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a divider-color token.

moderate.$description: Compound token for moderate divider style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a divider-color token.

strong.$description: Compound token for strong divider style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a divider-color token.

extra-strong.$description: Compound token for extra strong divider style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a divider-color token.

default.$description: Compound token for focus border style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a border-color token. ALWAYS USE WITH 2PX WIDTH!
Compound token for inverse border style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a border-color token. ALWAYS USE WITH 1PX WIDTH!

weak.$description: Compound token for inverse border style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a border-color token. ALWAYS USE WITH 1PX WIDTH!

default.$description: Compound token for focus border style. Note: Figma doesn't support compound tokens so in figma this token is replaced with a border-color token. ALWAYS USE WITH 2PX WIDTH!
